name: lvb
description: This is a patch-mod for Stellaris, updating the [Lustful Void|https://www.loverslab.com/topic/119724-mod-stellaris-lustful-void-wip] mod with some personal tweaks. All credit to Lithia<3, I claim none.

scripts.release: rm '!!!LV Blue Edits.zip' || true && cd mod && zip -r '!!!LV Blue Edits.zip' '!!!LV Blue Edits' '!!!LV Blue Edits.mod' && mv '!!!LV Blue Edits.zip' ..
